officialTitle: Patient Perspectives in Breast Cancer Care During COVID-19
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of participants with changes implemented to breast cancer treatment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult females with diagnosis of invasive breast cancer or ductal carcinoma in situ, seen as surgical consultation between 06/01/19-06/01/20

Exclusion Criteria:

* Males
* Patients with non-cancer diagnoses
* Patients with no history of breast cancer
